data.name: Boomerang
data.description: Boomerang is a tool to expose multiple internal servers to web/cloud. Agent & Server are pretty stable and can be used in Red Team for Multiple levels of Pivoting and exposing multiple internal services to external/other networks

data.name: inletsctl
data.description: The fastest way to create self-hosted exit-servers

data.name: pwndrop
data.description: Self-deployable file hosting service for red teamers, allowing to easily upload and share payloads over HTTP and WebDAV.

data.name: boltstream
data.description: Boltstream Live Video Streaming Website + Backend
